findings.title: Elevated impact to smart contract’s safety and security due to active smart contract owner privileges
findings.description: Active smart contract owner privileges constitute an elevated impact on smart contract's safety and security.

findings.title: Low severity issue in McpPlatform.sol smart contract
findings.description: McpPlatform.sol smart contract has a low severity issue which may or may not create any functional vulnerability.

findings.title: Minting of NFTs without utilizing ReentrancyGuard to prevent reentrant calls to a function
findings.description: MyCryptoPixels does not utilize 'ReentrancyGuard' to prevent reentrant calls to a function, which may lead to functional vulnerability.
